text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Opposition parties hail King Hassan speech at opening of autumn session of parliament for stressing dialogue and consensus.
- Morocco invited to attend ceremony during which Gambian colonel Yahia Jammeh will take oath of office as president.
- Eighth campaign of vaccination days to fight child illnesses to be launched on Monday throughout Maghreb Arab countries.
- King Hassan calls for transparency in political life.
- European Fisheries Commissioner Emma Bonino's plans to reduce fishing fleet could have impact on last Morocco-EU fish accord due to end in 1999.
